name: The Lost
detailed_description:
The Lost is ultimate FPS VR game.
You must defend yourself from enemies with various guns.
The Lost is only available in single mode, and you can gradually clear the stages according to the difficulty.
Take over best teleport spots and choose proper guns strategically to defeat enemies!

Features
  • 6 waves to completed the game
  • Various combat locations
  • Teleport to certain spots
  • Various and realistic gun shooting experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
